record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1901. Fourth row: Lee Wilder Maxwell, John Jameson Laird, Clarke Saxe Jennison, Alfred Chester Ellsworth, Marcus Melvin Beddall, Benjamin Straus, and Edson Benton Cooke; third row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), Ernest Earl Perkins, George Henry Garrey, and Orville Elbridge Atwood; second row: Rex Brenton Kennedy, Frank Ogilvie Horton, James Milton Sheldon (captain), Charles Gibbons Flanagan, and Ralph Lemuel Knapp; first row: James Garfield MacNab, Platt Milk Conrad, and Frederick Adolph Speik.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on board. Attached caption, photographer stamp.
